com.qtplaf.library.swing

Class ProgressManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.swing.ProgressManager

  • public class ProgressManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Progress manager utility.

    To perform actions or checkings prior to close the frame, add the actions to the list of pre-close actions. If the closing should be cancelled, the action must thow any kind of exception, normally java.lang exception compatible with the actionPerformed method like for instance IllegalStateException.

    Author:
    Miquel Sas
